about_the_game:
This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 all-new playable characters from developer Orange_Juice - Ceoreparque and Miusaki from the Alicianrone universe, and a new single player campaign featuring them. Both characters come with character and announcer voices!

Witch Pack includes

  • Ceoreparque from the world of 'Alicianrone' (Voice: Murakami Natsumi)
  • Miusaki from the world of 'Alicianrone' (Voice: Toda Megumi)
  • New, unique Hyper Cards for both characters to bring chaos to the battlefield with!
  • New music tracks play as Ceoreparque and Miusaki's themes
  • An all-new campaign featuring the new characters and expanding the lore of the game!

The new characters are designed by Orange_Juice’s original staff for the game’s English Steam release, with character and hyper card art by Hono.

name: 100% Orange Juice - Witch Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card

short_description: This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 all-new playable characters from developer Orange_Juice - Ceoreparque and Miusaki from the Alicianrone universe, and a new single player campaign featuring them. Both characters come with character and announcer voices!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
